revised_title: Eruption of Krakatoa and Related Phenomena
tldr: This article presents a list of publications related to the 1883 eruption of Krakatoa, including pamphlets on the phenomena connected with the event and charts showing the mean barometric pressure over the Atlantic, Indian, and Pacific Oceans. It also includes duplicate publications to supply deficiencies and alphabetical lists of patentees and inventions for the quarter ending September 30, 1888.
